}} 'Patricia Evelyn Beverley Matthews Harmsworth, Viscountess Rothermere' (5 May
1933 – 12 August 1992) was an English socialite and actress. As 'Beverly
Brooks', she appeared in several films, such as [[Reach for the Sky (1956
film)|Reach for the Sky]] (1956).

As Lady Rothermere, she led a colourful social life, earning her the nickname of
"Bubbles", through a love of champagne and her spherical figure. She died from a
heart attack in Nice, France aged 59.
